lead_paragraph: A good way to improve a sales powerhouse is to add more power. With a turbocharged engine, the 2017 Exclaim model makes the boxy Soul more satisfying.
snippet: A good way to improve a sales powerhouse is to add more power. With a turbocharged engine, the 2017 Exclaim model makes the boxy Soul more satisfying....

headline.main: The Kia Soul Exclaim Adds Pep to Its Boxy Figure
headline.print_headline: Kia’s Soul Exclaim Isn’t Svelte, but It Does Have Plenty of Pep
